Column.Name: Vendor RecordID
Column.Formula:
LET $vendorName := [Vendor Value]#ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Vendor Key], "name");
RETURN DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Vendor", "[Company Name] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT($vendorName) )

Column.Name: Contract RecordID
Column.Formula:
LET $opportunityID := COALESCE([Response Id], [Evaluation Response Id]);
RETURN DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Contract", "[VP Response ID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT($opportunityID) )

Column.Name: Contract Settings
Parent Structure

Information.Text: TRUE if Response ID doesn't match an existing Response ID for another record on this EForm

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Set Process Award Completed to FALSE

DisplayMessage.MessageTemplate: This award has already been processed

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Set Process Award Completed to FALSE

FieldEntry.Formula:
IF( [Procurement RecordID]<> NULL, DB_LOOKUP( "Start Date", "Procurement", HASH("RecordID", [Procurement RecordID]) ),
HASH_GET([Opportunity Details], "dateFinalisedUtc") )
HASH_MERGE( target.[Process Completion Hash - Stored], HASH_MERGE( HASH("Advertise", TRUE), HASH("Advertise - Date Complete", NOW()), HASH("Award", TRUE), HASH("Award - Date Complete", NOW()), ) )

LET $vendorName := [Vendor Value]#ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Vendor Key], "name");
RETURN DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Vendor", "[Company Name] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT($vendorName) ) <> NULL()

LET $opportunityID := [Response Id];
RETURN DB_LOOKUP( "VP Response ID", "Contract", "[VP Response ID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT($opportunityID) ) <> NULL()
HASH_GET(DB_LOOKUP( "EventArgs", "VP Opportunity", "[Opportunity Id] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Opportunity Id]) & " AND [LineNumber] = 1" ), "raw")

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Get Procurement Planning Data (for award purposes)

Event.Name: Process Centralised Award
Event.Description: Calls Award form and pushes in required information

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $result := DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Award", "[VP Opportunity RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY AND [VP Opportunity RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([VP Opportunity ID]) );
RETURN IF( $result <> NULL, ARRAY($result), $result )

FormulaDrivenChangeFieldValues.Description: Add on to an existing award record (do this OR create a new award record)

FormulaDrivenRaiseLinkedEForm.Description: Create new award record (do this OR change an existing award record)

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $vendorName := [Vendor Value]#ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Vendor Key], "name");
RETURN DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Vendor", "[Company Name] FAST_EQUAL_TO " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT($vendorName) ) <> NULL()

LET $opportunityID := [Evaluation Response Id];
RETURN DB_LOOKUP( "VP Response ID", "Contract", "[VP Response ID] FAST_EQUAL_TO " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT($opportunityID) ) <> NULL()
HASH_GET( DB_LOOKUP( "EventArgs", "VP Opportunity", "[Evaluation Opportunity Id] FAST_EQUAL_TO " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Evaluation Opportunity Id]) & " AND [LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1" ), "raw" )
HASH_GET( INDEXES_TO_KEYS( EACH [Offer Value], EACH [Offer Key] ), "exTax" )

Save.Description: Plugin has a save baked in so this is disabled

TriggerCustomEvent.Description: Get Response Details - Only runs when the last response is sent (# of responses = response count on opportunity Id)
